old:
<COL 78f5ff>絶望の大陸 第三節：「王都の決戦」到達！</COL>

　“ひととき目覚めた精霊竜の力に支えられ
　　覚者は黒き刃を退けた

　　展望城に引き続き奪還したは
　　王家の栄華そのものである城塞都市メガド

　　しかし巨大な都の全てを守るには
　　彼の腕はまだか弱く小さい――”
new:
<COL 78f5ff>The Land of Despair, Part 3："The Final Battle of the Royal Capital" is reached!</COL>

"Supported by the power of the spirit dragon that awakened for a moment,
the Arisen repelled the black blade.

Following the Lookout Castle, they recaptured the Fortress City Megado, the very glory of the royal family.

But to protect all of the huge city, their arms are still too weak and small-- "

old:
精霊竜セシリー、そしてミシアルの導きにより
あなたは黒騎士に奪われた竜力を
取り戻すことに成功

さらには巨大な城塞都市メガド、その居住層の
奪還をも果たしました

かつては王都として栄華を誇った壮麗なるメガド
住民すらも全てを知らぬという広い都市には
まばゆい光に照らされ出でた影すらも
暗躍しているようです
new:
With the guidance of Cecily, the spirit dragon, and Mysial,
you succeeded in regaining the Dragon Force stolen by the black knight and even succeeded in recapturing the huge Fortress City Megado and its residential layer.

Megado, once a magnificent royal capital, is a large city where even the residents do not know everything,
and shadows appear even in the dazzling light. 

Even the shades that once were seem to be lurking in the shadows!
